## Store type

An object that inlines all [Ref](./reactive.ref.md) values and enables using them transparently.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type Store<T> = {
    [P in keyof T]: T[P] extends Ref<any> ? T[P]['current'] : T[P];
};
```
<b>References:</b> [Ref](./reactive.ref.md)
